00001| // IMPORTANT: When adding new env variables to the codebase, update this array
00002| export const ENV_VARIABLES: EnvVariable[] = [
00003|   // Add your active environment variables here
00004| ];
00005| 
00006| // SUPABASE/DATABASE VARIABLES (uncomment and add to ENV_VARIABLES array when adding database features)
00007| // {
00008| //   name: "DATABASE_URL",
00009| //   description: "Supabase PostgreSQL database connection string for migrations and server-side operations",
00010| //   required: true,
00011| //   instructions: "Go to [Supabase Dashboard](https://supabase.com/dashboard) → Your Project → Settings → Database → Connection string (URI format).\n Copy the full postgresql:// connection string.\n Make sure to replace [YOUR-PASSWORD] with actual password"
00012| // },
00013| // {
00014| //   name: "NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_URL",
00015| //   description: "Supabase project URL for client-side authentication and API calls",
00016| //   required: true,
00017| //   instructions: "Go to [Supabase Dashboard](https://supabase.com/dashboard) → Your Project → Settings → Data API → Copy the 'Project URL -> URL' field (format: https://[project-id].supabase.co)"
00018| // },
00019| // {
00020| //   name: "NEXT_PUBLIC_SUPABASE_ANON_KEY",
00021| //   description: "Supabase anonymous/publishable key for client-side authentication",
00022| //   required: true,
00023| //   instructions: "Go to [Supabase Dashboard](https://supabase.com/dashboard) → Your Project → Settings → API Keys → Copy 'Legacy API keys → anon public' key"
00024| // }
00025| 
00026| export interface EnvVariable {
00027|   name: string
00028|   description: string
00029|   instructions: string
00030|   required: boolean
00031| }
00032| 
00033| export function checkMissingEnvVars(): string[] {
00034|   return ENV_VARIABLES.filter(envVar => envVar.required && !process.env[envVar.name]).map(envVar => envVar.name)
00035| }
</file>
